title: BRIEF-Mod Resources Says Supreme Court Made Orders Approving Scheme For Sandfire Resources To Acquire Co
text:
BRIEF-Mod Resources Says Supreme Court Made Orders Approving Scheme For Sandfire Resources To Acquire Co

Stock Markets 2 hours ago (Oct 08, 2019 18:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Mod Resources Says Supreme Court Made Orders Approving Scheme For Sandfire Resources To Acquire Co Oct 8 (Reuters) - Mod Resources Ltd : * SUPREME COURT OF WESTERN AUSTRALIA MADE ORDERS APPROVING SCHEME OF ARRANGEMENT FOR SANDFIRE RESOURCES TO ACQUIRE CO

BRIEF-Mod Resources Says Supreme Court Made Orders Approving Scheme For Sandfire Resources To Acquire Co
